eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian, Entropy, VegeTato
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Flash
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Make the object flash (blink) for a period of time, so that it is alternately visible and invisible.
description: Make the object flash (blink) for a period of time, so that it is alternately visible and invisible.
After adding this behavior to an object, you **trigger the effect** by using the **Flash action**.
- Let players know they are invincible after being hit
- Catch player attention on the interface (for instance a "press start" text)

eventsFunctions.description: Color tint that is currently applied to the object. "255;255;255" is used when there is no tint applied.
eventsFunctions.name: Tint

events.comment: Return the color string for the tint applied to the object

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Make the object flash (blink) for a period of time so that it alternates between visible and invisible.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Flash

eventsFunctions.description: Make object blink visibility for a period of time.
eventsFunctions.name: Flash

parameters.description: Duration of the blinking, in seconds
parameters.name: FlashDuration

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the specified objects are flashing.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFlashing

eventsFunctions.description: Stop flashing visibility (blink) of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Stop

propertyDescriptors.label: Half period (time during which object is invisible)
propertyDescriptors.name: HalfPeriodTime

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Make the object flash a color tint for a period of time.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: FlashColor

eventsFunctions.description: Make the specified object(s) change color for the given duration.
eventsFunctions.name: Flash
eventsFunctions.sentence: Make _PARAM0_ flash the color _PARAM3_ for _PARAM2_ seconds

events.comment: Only save the tint if it is not currently flashing

parameters.description: Duration of the blinking, in seconds
parameters.name: FlashDuration

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the specified objects are flashing.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFlashing

propertyDescriptors.label: Half period (time between flashes), in seconds
propertyDescriptors.name: HalfPeriodTime

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Flash opacity in a looping tween
eventsBasedBehaviors.fullName: Flash opacity in a looping tween
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: FlashOpacity

eventsFunctions.description: Make the object fade opacity in a loop.
eventsFunctions.name: Flash
eventsFunctions.sentence: Make _PARAM0_ fade opacity to _PARAM4_ in a loop for _PARAM3_ seconds

parameters.description: Duration of the blinking, in seconds
parameters.name: FlashDuration

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the specified objects are flashing.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFlashing

propertyDescriptors.label: Half period (time between flashes), in seconds
propertyDescriptors.name: HalfPeriodTime

propertyDescriptors.label: Target opacity (Range: 0 - 255)
propertyDescriptors.description: Opacity will fade between the starting value and this target value
propertyDescriptors.name: TargetOpacity

propertyDescriptors.label: Starting opacity
propertyDescriptors.description: Opacity will fade between the starting value and this target value
propertyDescriptors.name: StartingOpacity

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Make the object flash an effect for a period of time.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: FlashEffect

eventsFunctions.description: Make the object flash an effect for a period of time.
eventsFunctions.name: Flash
eventsFunctions.sentence: Make _PARAM0_ flash the effect _PARAM3_ for _PARAM2_ seconds

events.name: Stop flashing if the effect name has changed
Save starting state (only when not flashing)

parameters.description: Duration of the blinking, in seconds
parameters.name: FlashDuration

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the specified objects are flashing.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFlashing

eventsFunctions.description: Stop flashing an effect of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Stop

propertyDescriptors.label: Half period (time between flashes), in seconds
propertyDescriptors.name: HalfPeriodTime
